elements.text: You are on a trip to the beach with a close friend. As you walk along the shore, your mind gets stuck on thoughts of the future. You wonder if your HD symptoms might make walks in the sand more difficult. You stop walking and look out at the horizon, noticing the sunset and feeling...

elements.name: Beach Reflection_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
